backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the FINPROLEDGE backend, defining all core data types (ServiceRequest, ClientDocument, ComplianceDeliverable, PaymentRecord, etc.) and mixing in authorization and blob-storage functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that admin access for finproledge@gmail.com is implemented across AdminGuard, Navigation, and backend role-check layers with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summary of every frontend source file, describing the purpose and key changes of each component, page, and hook in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the application.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell titled 'FINPROLEDGE' that mounts the React app via a root div and the main.tsx module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application component that sets up TanStack Router with all page routes (including protected and compliance-admin routes), React Query, and the ThemeProvider.
frontend/src/components/AdminClientDeliv: Admin table component for viewing, accepting/rejecting, and submitting client deliverables, with a dialog form for adding new deliverables on behalf of a client and download options.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Route guard component that restricts access to admin pages by checking backend admin status or an email-based override (finproledge@gmail.com), with loading states and an email verification fallback prompt.
frontend/src/components/AdminPaymentSett: Admin-only form component for configuring the PayPal receiving email address, with validation, success/error alerts, and persistence via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/AdminPaymentTabl: Displays a table of all client payment records with status badges, payment method labels, and inline status update controls, plus a banner showing the configured PayPal account.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Client: Displays client retention analytics including a donut pie chart of returning vs. new visitors and a portal funnel drop-off table, derived from ClientRetentionMetrics data.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Conver: Renders a conversion and goal analysis section showing an overall conversion rate card and a breakdown table of individual goal completions (forms, sign-ups, uploads) with computed rates.
frontend/src/components/analytics/LeadGe: Displays lead generation metrics including form submission counts with a progress bar, click-to-call counts, and a lead quality breakdown table categorized by high, medium, and low value leads.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Search: React component showing search intent and SEO metrics including local SEO keyword rankings, seasonal traffic bar chart, and AI search visibility score using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/analytics/SEOAna: React component that displays an SEO analysis dashboard with stat cards for SEO score, click-through rate, and backlink health, plus a keyword rankings table with position deltas.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Techni: React component displaying Core Web Vitals (LCP, INP, CLS) with ratings, mobile-friendliness score, and an error monitoring table for 404s and broken links.
React component that renders three stat cards for SSL/security score, mobile responsiveness score, and page load speed with color-coded badges based on thresholds.
frontend/src/components/analytics/Traffi: React component visualizing traffic acquisition data with a bar chart for source/medium breakdown, a pie chart for new vs. returning visitors, and a landing pages table using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/analytics/TrustM: React component that displays trust and authority metrics for a financial services site, including average time on About/Team pages, review/testimonial clicks, and a blog article engagement table with static sample data.
frontend/src/components/analytics/UserBe: React component that renders user behavior and engagement analytics, showing session duration, bounce rate, page views, sessions, scroll depth zones, and an event tracking table with fallback static values.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsDashboa: Tabbed analytics dashboard that fetches site analytics data (falling back to mock data) and renders sections for traffic, user behavior, SEO, performance, conversions, lead generation, trust metrics, search intent, technical reliability, and client retention.
frontend/src/components/ClientCreateFoll: Form component that allows clients to create a follow-up item with title, description, due date, status, and notes, submitting via a mutation hook with validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ClientCreateTime: Form component for creating a client timeline entry with title, description, start/end dates, and status, including date validation and submission via a mutation hook with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/ClientCreateToDo: A form component that allows clients to create new To-Do items with title, description, priority, status, and optional file attachment, using the useCreateClientToDo mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ClientDeliverabl: A form component for clients to submit deliverables with a title, description, and file upload (supporting drag-and-drop), tracking upload progress and showing success/error toasts.
A table component that displays a client's submitted deliverables with status badges and approve/reject action buttons, fetching data via useGetMyClientDeliverables.
frontend/src/components/ClientTasksTab.t: A tabbed interface component showing a client's To-Dos, Timelines, and Follow-Ups in separate tables, each with a dialog for creating new items and inline status selects.
frontend/src/components/ComplianceAdminD: An empty file with no content or implementation.
frontend/src/components/ComplianceAdminF: A table component for compliance admins that lists all follow-up items with client name resolution, due dates, notes, and inline status selects, fetched via useGetAllFollowUps.
frontend/src/components/ComplianceAdminT: Admin table component that displays all timeline entries with title, assigned client (resolved via profile lookup), date range, and an inline status selector. Handles loading, error, and empty states.
Admin to-do list table that fetches all todos, displays priority/status badges, resolves client names, supports document download, and provides CSV/ZIP export plus a dialog to create new todos.
frontend/src/components/ComplianceDocume: Client-facing card component that lists the current user's completed and approved deliverables with type labels, dates, status badges, and a download button.
frontend/src/components/CreateFollowUpFo: Form component for admins to create a new follow-up item, collecting title, description, due date, status, notes, and an optional client principal selected from approved clients.
frontend/src/components/CreateTimelineFo: Form component for admins to create a new timeline entry with title, description, start/end dates, status, and an optional assigned client principal chosen from approved clients.
frontend/src/components/CreateToDoForm.t: A form component for creating new To-Do items with fields for title, description, priority, status, assigned client, and optional file attachment, using React Query mutations and toast notifications.
A card component that displays a compliance deliverable's details including status, type, due date, and urgency indicators, with placeholder approve/reject mutation buttons that are not yet backend-supported.
frontend/src/components/DocumentTable.ts: A table component that lists client documents with type badges, upload dates, and download functionality, supporting both admin mode (prop-supplied documents) and client mode (fetched documents), with multi-format export via DownloadOptionsMenu.
frontend/src/components/DocumentUploadFo: A form component for uploading client documents with drag-and-drop support, document type selection, upload progress tracking, and approval status handling.
frontend/src/components/DownloadOptionsM: A dropdown menu component that provides multiple export format options (PDF, XLSX, DOCX, CSV, ZIP, image) for table data and file blobs, delegating to utility export functions.
frontend/src/components/EcwidWidget.tsx: An empty or minimal component file, likely a placeholder for an Ecwid e-commerce widget integration.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main page layout wrapper with a sticky Navigation, main content area, and a footer containing brand info, social links, and quick navigation links.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Renders a login/logout button using Internet Identity authentication, showing loading, logged-in, or logged-out states and clearing the React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/MyComplianceTask: Displays a tabbed compliance dashboard for the current user showing To-Dos, Timelines, and Follow-Ups with summary stats, status selectors, and dialogs to create new items.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Renders the sticky top navigation bar with a services dropdown, admin-aware links, mobile menu, and login button, determining admin status via backend query and email check.
frontend/src/components/PaymentForm.tsx: Provides a form for submitting payment requests with fields for amount, currency, payment method, and card type, storing amounts as integer cents and calling the createPayment mutation.
frontend/src/components/PaymentHistoryTa: Fetches and displays the current user's payment history in a table with formatted amounts, status badges, and payment method labels, showing skeletons while loading.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Guards child routes by checking Internet Identity authentication status, showing a spinner during initialization or a login prompt with navigation options if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/ServiceRequestFo: A form component that allows authenticated users to submit service requests by selecting a service type, entering a description, and choosing a deadline. Uses the useCreateRequest hook to persist data and shows toast notifications on success or failure.
frontend/src/components/TaskStatusSelect: Provides three optimistic-update select components (ToDoStatusSelect, TimelineStatusSelect, FollowUpStatusSelect) for updating the status of compliance tasks inline, with loading indicators and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: A modal dialog that appears after login when no user profile exists, prompting the user to enter their name, email, and company to complete initial profile setup via the useSaveCallerUserProfile hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using React Query, supporting both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) access, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnalytics.ts: Custom React hooks for fetching analytics data from the backend actor, providing both a legacy `getAnalyticsSummary` query and a newer `getNewAnalyticsSummary` query that returns lead generation, trust, search intent, technical reliability, and client retention metrics.
frontend/src/hooks/useApprovals.ts: Custom React hooks for managing user approval workflows, exposing queries to list approvals and check caller approval status, and mutations to set approval status or request approval.
frontend/src/hooks/useClientDeliverables: Custom React hooks for client deliverable operations, including fetching own and all deliverables, submitting deliverables (with optional upload progress), submitting on behalf of a client, and updating deliverable status.
frontend/src/hooks/useComplianceAdmin.ts: Custom React hooks for compliance administration, providing queries and mutations for managing to-dos, timelines, and follow-ups for both admin (all records) and client (own records) views.
frontend/src/hooks/useDeliverables.ts: Custom React hooks for compliance deliverables, exposing queries to fetch a user's own, pending, or all deliverables, and a mutation to create a new deliverable assigned to a client.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocuments.ts: Custom React hooks for document management, providing a query to fetch all client documents and a mutation to upload a new document with type, name, MIME type, and file blob.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, wrapping DFINITY's AuthClient to expose login, logout, and identity state with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePayments.ts: Custom React Query hooks for payment operations including fetching user/admin payments, creating payments, updating payment status, and managing admin payment settings via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file that defers query logic to feature-specific hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceRequests.ts: Custom React Query hooks for service request CRUD operations, including fetching user/all requests, creating standard and visitor requests, and updating request status.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Custom React Query hooks for user profile operations, including fetching the caller's profile, looking up profiles by principal, and saving profile updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet defining a dark-themed design system with CSS custom properties for colors (navy/gold palette), Tailwind directives, and typography using Lora and IBM Plex Sans fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutUsPage.tsx: Static marketing page describing the company's mission and core competencies (taxation, audit, accounting, financial administration) with a hero section and feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard page with tabbed sections for managing service requests, documents, user approvals, payments, deliverables, and analytics, protected by an AdminGuard component.
frontend/src/pages/ClientPortalPage.tsx: Client portal page with tabbed navigation for service requests, document upload/viewing, payments, and deliverables, filtered to the authenticated user's data.
frontend/src/pages/ComplianceAdminDashbo: Admin dashboard page for managing compliance To-Dos, Timelines, and Follow-Ups, with dialog-based creation forms for each category.
frontend/src/pages/ComplianceDashboardPa: Compliance dashboard for authenticated users with tabs for compliance tasks, deliverables, task deadlines, and documents.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Public marketing homepage displaying services, company principles, testimonials, and stats for the FinProLedge accounting firm.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceBookingPage.ts: Public service booking page that renders the ServiceRequestForm alongside a sidebar explaining the review, consultation, and execution process.
frontend/src/pages/VisitorServiceRequest: Public contact/enquiry page allowing unauthenticated visitors to submit a service request with their name, email, company, and service type.
frontend/src/utils/dateHelpers.ts: Utility functions for converting nanosecond timestamps to days remaining, formatted date strings, and checking if a deadline is within five days.
frontend/src/utils/fileExport.ts: Provides browser-native utilities to export table data as CSV, XLSX (SpreadsheetML XML), or Word-compatible HTML documents by triggering blob downloads.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration that enables dark mode, maps CSS variable-based design tokens (colors, radius, shadows), sets custom font families (Lora, IBM Plex Sans), and registers the animate and typography plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the FinProLedge Portal project state (version 3), recording one known issue—admin portal access for finproledge@gmail.com—and one existing fix feature targeting AdminGuard, navigation visibility, and backend role checks for that user.
